message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its immense value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for us to begin our discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and what I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,000,000 is significantly below its true value and my initial asking price.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're trying to get a good price, but I'm still a bit above $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
